h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Jade Essence Location
content: The Jade Essence Drink can be found in the Valley of Ecstasy, Towers of Karma Shrine, in The New West. From the Shrine, along the path to the left, you will eventually find a monument in the back of the area. Sitting behind this monument is the drink on a small snow-covered rock.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jade_Essence.md', within the main section titled 'Jade Essence', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Jade Essence Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Jade Essence Drink can be found in the Valley of Ecstasy, Towers of Karma Shrine, in The New West. From the Shrine, along the path to the left, you will eventually find a monument in the back of the area. Sitting behind this monument is the drink on a small snow-covered rock.
